description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fu2i3","text":"This protocol was based on the original protocol by Ulschan Bathe and Kristen Van Gelder from the Hanson Lab at UF in 2023.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51ip1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f971f","text":"It details how to fuse 2 yeast protoplasts. It is focused on obtaining an evolution strain with the system OrthoRep, but should work for the fusion of any 2 yeast strains provided the selection scheme is functional.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
